description:
Have you got an idea for a business but don't know how to make it happen?

That is a common problem for millions of first-time entrepreneurs, and I am here to help you! In this no nonsense course I walk you through every step of the way on how to turn your idea into a company in the modern business world of 2016. There is not a second wasted in this course, as we get straight to the important stuff.

Why take this course?

By taking this course you'll learn quickly and bypass all the unnecessary business jargon that many courses spend hours on. Time is the most valuable resource for you and I both, so we will get straight to it in a friendly, fast paced manner.

What will you get from this course?

  • A real business ready for customers!
  • Knowledge about the basics of business.
  • A repeatable method to convert future ideas into businesses.
  • BONUS: Access to The Exceptions entrepreneur network for free!


How is this course structured?

This course takes you step by step from start to finish. From the idea, to the business model, marketing, legal, strategy, raising money and more. All presented in straight-to-the-point, easy to watch videos.
title: How to Start a Business: Ultimate Guide from Idea to Income.
